trans-unit.source: Represents a WMI event query in *WQL* format.
trans-unit.target: 表示 WQL 格式的 WMI 事件查询。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The string representing either the entire event query or the name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 代表整个事件查询或要查询的事件类名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The object will try to parse the string as a valid event query.
trans-unit.target: 对象将尝试将该字符串分析为有效的事件查询。

trans-unit.source: If unsuccessful, the parser will assume that the parameter represents an event class name.
trans-unit.target: 如果不成功，分析器将假定该参数表示事件类名。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> class based on the given query string or event class name.
trans-unit.target: 基于给定的查询字符串或事件类名初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a <xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery> by specifying a query and then initializes a <xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery> by specifying an event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例初始化<xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery>通过指定查询，然后初始化<xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery>通过指定事件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的事件类的名称。

trans-unit.source: The condition to apply to events of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 要应用到指定类的事件的条件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> class for the specified event class name, with the specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定条件，为指定事件类名初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的事件类的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value specifying the latency acceptable for receiving this event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值，它指定对于接收此事件而言所能接受的滞后时间。

trans-unit.source: This value is used in cases where there is no explicit event provider for the query requested, and WMI is required to poll for the condition.
trans-unit.target: 该值用于以下情况：对于所请求的查询没有显式事件提供程序，并且需要 WMI 轮询条件。

trans-unit.source: This interval is the maximum amount of time that can pass before notification of an event must be delivered.
trans-unit.target: 该间隔是在必须发送事件通知之前可以经过的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> class for the specified event class, with the specified latency time.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定滞后时间，为指定的事件类初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a <xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery> by specifying an event and a time span value specifying the latency acceptable for receiving this event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例初始化<xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery>通过指定事件和时间跨度值，该值指定用于接收此事件可接受的延迟。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的事件类的名称。

trans-unit.source: The condition to apply to events of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 要应用到指定类的事件的条件。

trans-unit.source: The specified interval at which WMI sends one <c>aggregate event</c>, rather than many events.
trans-unit.target: 指定的间隔，WMI 在该间隔内发送一个 <c>aggregate event</c>，而不是发送很多个事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> class with the specified event class name, condition, and grouping interval.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的事件类名、条件和分组间隔初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的事件类的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value specifying the latency acceptable for receiving this event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值，它指定对于接收此事件而言所能接受的滞后时间。

trans-unit.source: This value is used in cases where there is no explicit event provider for the query requested and WMI is required to poll for the condition.
trans-unit.target: 该值用于以下情况：对于所请求的查询没有显式事件提供程序，并且需要 WMI 轮询条件。

trans-unit.source: This interval is the maximum amount of time that can pass before notification of an event must be delivered.
trans-unit.target: 该间隔是在必须发送事件通知之前可以经过的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: The condition to apply to events of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 要应用到指定类的事件的条件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> class with the specified event class name, polling interval, and condition.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的事件类名、轮询间隔和条件初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the event query: "SELECT * FROM __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 10 WHERE TargetInstance ISA Win32_Service ", which sends notification of the creation of **Win32_Service** instances, with a 10-second polling interval.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建的事件查询:"选择 * 从 __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 10 其中 TargetInstance ISA Win32_Service"，这将创建的通知发送**Win32_Service**情况下的，使用 10 秒轮询间隔。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的事件类的名称。

trans-unit.source: The condition to apply to events of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 要应用到指定类的事件的条件。

trans-unit.source: The specified interval at which WMI sends one <c>aggregate event</c>, rather than many events.
trans-unit.target: 指定的间隔，WMI 在该间隔内发送一个 <c>aggregate event</c>，而不是发送很多个事件。

trans-unit.source: The properties in the event class by which the events should be grouped.
trans-unit.target: 作为事件分组依据的事件类的属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> class with the specified event class name, condition, grouping interval, and grouping properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的事件类名、条件、分组间隔和分组属性来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event class on which to be queried.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的事件类的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value specifying the latency acceptable for receiving this event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值，它指定对于接收此事件而言所能接受的滞后时间。

trans-unit.source: This value is used in cases where there is no explicit event provider for the query requested, and WMI is required to poll for the condition.
trans-unit.target: 该值用于以下情况：对于所请求的查询没有显式事件提供程序，并且需要 WMI 轮询条件。

trans-unit.source: This interval is the maximum amount of time that can pass before notification of an event must be delivered.
trans-unit.target: 该间隔是在必须发送事件通知之前可以经过的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: The condition to apply to events of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 要应用到指定类的事件的条件。

trans-unit.source: The specified interval at which WMI sends one <c>aggregate event</c>, rather than many events.
trans-unit.target: 指定的间隔，WMI 在该间隔内发送一个 <c>aggregate event</c>，而不是发送很多个事件。

trans-unit.source: The properties in the event class by which the events should be grouped.
trans-unit.target: 作为事件分组依据的事件类的属性。

trans-unit.source: The condition to apply to the number of events.
trans-unit.target: 要应用到事件数目的条件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> class with the specified event class name, condition, grouping interval, grouping properties, and specified number of events.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的事件类名、条件、分组间隔、分组属性和指定数目的事件来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.WqlEventQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the event query: "SELECT * FROM __InstanceCreationEvent WHERE TargetInstance ISA Win32_NTLogEvent GROUP WITHIN 600 BY TargetInstance.SourceName HAVING NumberOfEvents > 15" which delivers aggregate events only if the number of **Win32_NTLogEvent** events received from the same source exceeds 15.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建的事件查询:"选择 * 从 __InstanceCreationEvent 其中 TargetInstance ISA Win32_NTLogEvent 组内 600 通过 TargetInstance.SourceName HAVING NumberOfEvents > 15"它提供了聚合事件，仅当的数字**Win32_NTLogEvent**超过 15 个接收到来自相同来源的事件。

trans-unit.source: Builds the query string according to the current property values.
trans-unit.target: 根据当前属性值生成查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: 创建对象的一个副本。

trans-unit.source: The copied object.
trans-unit.target: 所复制的对象。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the condition to be applied to events of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用到指定类的事件的条件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the condition or conditions in the event query.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，该值包含事件查询中的一个或多个条件。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new condition.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的条件。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: The condition is represented as a string, containing one or more clauses of the form: \<propName> \<operator> \<value> combined with logical operators.
trans-unit.target: 条件表示为字符串，包含窗体的一个或多个子句： \<propName >\<运算符 >\<值 > 结合逻辑运算符。

trans-unit.source: \<propName> must represent a property defined on the event class specified in this query.
trans-unit.target: \<propName > 必须表示在此查询中指定的事件类上定义的属性。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a new <xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery> and displays the event query string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例初始化新<xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery>和显示的事件查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要查询的事件类。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the name of the event class in the event query.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，该值包含事件查询中的事件类的名称。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new class name.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的类名称。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件类的查询的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a new <xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery> and displays the event query string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例初始化新<xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery>和显示的事件查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets properties in the event to be used for grouping events of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于对相同类型的事件进行分组的事件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> containing the properties in the event to be used for grouping events of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" />，它包含用于对相同类型的事件进行分组的事件属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new grouping.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的组合。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: Null, if no grouping is required; otherwise, a collection of event property names.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有分组是必需的; 则为 null否则为事件属性名称的集合。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a new <xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery> and displays the event query string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例初始化新<xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery>和显示的事件查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval to be used for grouping events of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对相同类型事件进行分组的间隔。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value containing the interval used for grouping events of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值，该值包含用于对相同类型的事件进行分组的间隔。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new interval.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: Null, if there is no grouping involved; otherwise, the interval in which WMI should group events of the same type.
trans-unit.target: Null，如果没有分组涉及到;否则，哪些 WMI 中的间隔应组相同类型的事件。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a new <xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery> and displays the event query string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例初始化新<xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery>和显示的事件查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the condition to be applied to the aggregation of events, based on the number of events received.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置基于所接收事件的数目要应用到事件聚合的条件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the condition applied to the aggregation of events, based on the number of events received.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，该值包含基于所接收事件的数目应用到事件聚合的条件。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new grouping condition.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新分组条件。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: Null, if no aggregation or no condition should be applied; otherwise, a condition of the form "NumberOfEvents \<operator> \<value>".
trans-unit.target: 如果为 null，应该应用聚合函数或任何条件;否则为该窗体的条件"NumberOfEvents\<运算符 >\<值 >"。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a new <xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery> and displays the event query string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例初始化新<xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery>和显示的事件查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: The query string to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 要分析的查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: Parses the query string and sets the property values accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 分析查询字符串并相应地设置属性值。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the language of the query.
trans-unit.target: 获取查询的语言。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value that contains the query language that the query is written in.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，该值包含用于编写查询的查询语言。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: The value of this property in this object is always "WQL".
trans-unit.target: 此对象中的此属性的值始终是"WQL"。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string representing the query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示查询的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the query.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含查询的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: A string representing the query.
trans-unit.target: 表示查询的字符串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a new <xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery> and displays the event query string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例初始化新<xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery>和显示的事件查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the polling interval to be used in this query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此查询中要使用的轮询间隔。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value containing the polling interval used in the event query.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值，该值包含用于事件查询的轮询间隔。

trans-unit.source: This property should only be set in cases where there is no *event provider* for the event requested, and WMI is required to poll for the requested condition.
trans-unit.target: 只应在用例中设置此属性没有任何*事件提供程序*请求的事件，并且 WMI 需轮询请求的条件。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new interval.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: Null, if there is no polling involved; otherwise, a valid <xref:System.TimeSpan> value if polling is required.
trans-unit.target: Null，如果没有轮询涉及到;否则为是有效<xref:System.TimeSpan>时轮询是必需的值。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a new <xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery> that represents the query: "SELECT * FROM __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 1 WHERE TargetInstance ISA 'Win32_Process'".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例初始化新<xref:System.Management.WqlEventQuery>表示查询:"选择 * 从 __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 1 WHERE TargetInstance ISA Win32_Process'"。
